April 2025: The solo section from “Strange” by Joe Satriani

  • The challenge: There are two frenetic solos stacked back-to-back in the middle of Satriani’s “Strange”. That’s right, it’s a back-to-back Satch-attack stack track, Jack. Our heroes must play each solo end-to-end with no stitching, but it is OK if they are from separate takes.
